mapper.insert: Insert into Inquiry( inquiry_no, product_no, product_name, member_id, seller_no, inquiry_content, inquiry_date) values( #{inquiry_no}, #{product_no}, #{product_name}, #{member_id}, #{seller_no}, #{inquiry_content}, SYSDATE)

select count(*) from order_finish where orderfinish_member_id = #{member_id}
